snippet: The authorities, yielding to years of pressure from environmental groups, also applied the curbs to bluefin tuna and black moss, a type of algae.
abstract: Hong Kong announces that it will no longer allow shark fin to be served at official functions, bowing to years of pressure from environmental groups.
lead_paragraph: The authorities, yielding to years of pressure from environmental groups, also applied the curbs to bluefin tuna and black moss, a type of algae.

headline.main: Hong Kong Drops Shark Fin From Official Menus
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Drops Shark Fin From Official Menus

keywords.value: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
keywords.name: organizations
